title: 09/06/21 DPS Hour 2
itunes:title: 09/06/21 DPS Hour 2
description:
Jonas Knox, Brady Quinn, and LaVar Arrington, in for Dan, react to the huge weekend of college football action and dive into what separates Alabama from the rest of the pack. The guys discuss Bryce Young's season debut and what expectations should be for him and the Alabama offense. Brady and LaVar give the quarterback and linebacker's perspective on throwing over the middle and putting receivers in dangerous situations. Plus, Brady gives the lowdown on one member of Big Noon Kickoff!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
